content.name: Capital Ship Loot Magnet
content.author: Assailer
content.description:
Capital Ship Loot Magnet Version 1.08
There is no known compatibility issue with any other mods, also uninstalling shall not affect your save games.

text.name: Capital Ship Loot Magnet
text.description: Player capital ships will be gathering inventory loot in a very large range. This will help clearing sectors from debris boosting your FPS and simulation speeds.
